content.question: Which of the following conditions most directly led to the establishment of the Regiment of U.S. Colored Troops?

choices.label: New legal protections for African American citizenship rights
A labor shortage and the decline of white enlistment in the army
African Americans’ demonstration of bravery on the battlefield
President Lincoln’s orders to desegregate the military

content.answer: A labor shortage and the decline of white enlistment in the army
